summary: Pandur Tattoo Mod for Malebodys (not for Argonier and Khajiit)...
descriptionHtml:
Pandur Tattoo Mod for Malebodys (not for Argonier and Khajiit)...

Des :

Hello all,this ist my first Skyrim Mod.I bring (15) Version of Upperbody Tattoos for Male Bodys in the Game(not for Argonier and Khajiit) ;)
You can look in the folder v1-v15 an select your favorite Tattoo.

Install :

Select your Tattoo,look in the Folder 1-15 the jpg,have you selected your Tattoo...
Copy the malebody_1.dds in your The Elder Scrolls V- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male directory,overwirte the old malebody_1.dds.
Thats all,go in the game and look it ;)


Uninstall :
To uninstall the mod,look in my Folder org,take the malebody_1.dds and copy this in The Elder Scrolls V- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male directory,
overwride the malebody_1.dds.

Have Fun...

Look my Home : http://www.mypandur.com/modforum/
author: Pandur
